sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Some observations made upon the Brasillian root, called ipepocoanha, imported from the Indies shewing its wonderful virtue against vomiting and looseness / written by a physitian in the countrey to the president of the Colledge of Physitians in London. Griffith, Richard, 1635?-1691. Pechey, John, 1655-1716.
7 p.
[s.n.], London : 1682.
Wrongly attributed to John Pechey by Surgeon general's catalogue (ser. 1); to John Pechey by Mansell; and to Dr. Griffith by Halkett and Laing. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

7 p.
[s.n.], London : 1682.
Wrongly attributed to John Pechey by Surgeon general's catalogue (ser. 1); to John Pechey by Mansell; and to Dr. Griffith by Halkett and Laing. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
